items.prompt: What is a collection of many stocks or bonds that acts as a single unit?
items.explanation: Un ETF es una colección de activos que se compra como una unidad.

items.prompt: I have used this investment app ______ 2021.
items.explanation: Since + punto específico en el tiempo (2021).

items.prompt: She has held those Apple shares ______ three years.
items.explanation: For + periodo de tiempo (tres años).

items.prompt: A ______ uses algorithms to manage your investments automatically.
items.explanation: Un robo-advisor gestiona inversiones automáticamente mediante algoritmos.

items.prompt: How ______ have you been tracking this asset's performance?
items.explanation: How long? (¿Cuánto tiempo...?).

items.prompt: ______ is a measure of how quickly an asset's price changes.
items.explanation: La volatilidad (volatility) mide la rapidez del cambio de precio.

items.prompt: We have diversified our portfolio ______ the market crash.
items.explanation: Since + evento específico.

items.prompt: The strategy of spreading risk across different assets is called ______.
items.explanation: Diversificación (diversification) es repartir el riesgo.

items.prompt: He hasn't checked his brokerage account ______ last Friday.
items.explanation: Since + el viernes pasado.

items.prompt: What is the total collection of all your investments called?
items.explanation: La colección de inversiones se llama 'portfolio'.

items.prompt: They have been digital asset traders ______ a few months.
items.explanation: For + periodo de tiempo (unos meses).

items.prompt: A higher ______ usually comes with a higher level of risk.
items.explanation: Un mayor rendimiento (yield) suele implicar mayor riesgo.

items.prompt: I haven't received any stock dividends ______ August.
items.explanation: Since + mes específico.

items.prompt: ______ represent units of ownership in a corporation.
items.explanation: Las acciones (stocks/shares) representan propiedad en una empresa.

items.prompt: Has she worked in wealth management ______ a long time?
items.explanation: For + mucho tiempo.

items.prompt: The robo-advisor has managed my funds ______ I opened the account.
items.explanation: Since + evento específico.

items.prompt: I have known my financial consultant ______ we were in college.
items.explanation: Since + momento específico en el pasado.

items.prompt: Is the ______ on this government bond guaranteed?
items.explanation: El rendimiento (yield) de un bono.

items.prompt: How long ______ you had your crypto wallet?
items.explanation: Presente perfecto: How long have you had...?

items.prompt: High ______ means the price of a stock goes up and down very fast.
items.explanation: Alta volatilidad significa cambios rápidos de precio.

items.prompt: I have had this ETF portfolio [blank] six months.
items.explanation: For + periodo (seis meses).

items.prompt: A [blank] uses artificial intelligence to invest your money.
items.explanation: Un robo-advisor usa IA para invertir.

items.prompt: She has been interested in green energy stocks [blank] last year.
items.explanation: Since + punto en el tiempo (el año pasado).

items.prompt: Low risk usually results in a lower [blank].
items.explanation: Bajo riesgo suele significar bajo rendimiento (yield).

items.prompt: They [blank] [blank] these bonds for five years.
items.explanation: Ellos han mantenido (have held) estos bonos.

items.prompt: A [blank] is a payment made by a company to its shareholders.
items.explanation: Un dividendo (dividend) es un pago a accionistas.

items.prompt: How [blank] have you been using that trading platform?
items.explanation: ¿Cuánto tiempo (How long) has estado usando...?

items.prompt: He has [blank] a premium user of the app since Monday.
items.explanation: Él ha sido (been) usuario premium.

items.prompt: An [blank] is a fund that tracks a specific index like the S&P 500.
items.explanation: Un ETF es un fondo cotizado.

items.prompt: I haven't invested in individual [blank] for a while.
items.explanation: Acciones individuales (stocks/shares).

items.prompt: We have had this savings plan [blank] several years.
items.explanation: For + periodo (varios años).

items.prompt: [blank] means your investment value changes very quickly.
items.explanation: Volatilidad significa cambios rápidos.

items.prompt: He [blank] [blank] [blank] his crypto balance since yesterday.
items.explanation: Él no ha revisado su saldo.

items.prompt: Reducing risk by buying different assets is [blank].
items.explanation: Reducir riesgo es diversificación.

items.prompt: I have [blank] this brokerage account since I was twenty-one.
items.explanation: He tenido (had) esta cuenta.

items.prompt: [blank] how long has she owned those tech shares?
items.explanation: ¿Desde hace cuánto tiempo?

items.prompt: The [blank] on this investment is 4% annually.
items.explanation: El rendimiento (yield) es del 4%.

items.prompt: She has [blank] a successful trader for a decade.
items.explanation: Ella ha sido una trader exitosa.

items.prompt: Many tech companies do not pay a monthly [blank].
items.explanation: Dividendo (dividend).

items.prompt: We haven't changed our strategy [blank] the start of the year.
items.explanation: Since + inicio de año.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: I have had this ETF since 2020
items.explanation: He tenido este ETF desde 2020.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: she has been a trader for six months
items.explanation: Ella ha sido trader por seis meses.

items.prompt: Reorder the question:
items.sentence: how long have you been invested?
items.explanation: ¿Cuánto tiempo llevas invertido?

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: the market volatility is high today
items.explanation: La volatilidad del mercado es alta hoy.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: they have not paid dividends since June
items.explanation: No han pagado dividendos desde junio.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: a portfolio is a collection of assets
items.explanation: Una cartera es una colección de activos.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: he has known him for three years
items.explanation: Él lo conoce desde hace tres años.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: the yield on these stocks is high
items.explanation: El rendimiento de estas acciones es alto.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: we have not sold any stocks since Monday
items.explanation: No hemos vendido acciones desde el lunes.

items.prompt: How long have they ______ their current asset strategy?
items.explanation: Participio de 'follow' es 'followed'.

items.prompt: I have been [blank] individual stocks [blank] I was eighteen.
items.explanation: He estado comprando desde que tenía dieciocho.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: He has held the position for two days
items.explanation: Él ha mantenido la posición por dos días.

items.prompt: Has she ______ any gains on her portfolio this month?
items.explanation: ¿Ha materializado ella alguna ganancia?

items.prompt: The [blank] has [blank] my risk level since the update.
items.explanation: El robo-advisor ha ajustado mi nivel de riesgo.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: Diversification has reduced my overall risk
items.explanation: La diversificación ha reducido mi riesgo general.

items.prompt: I have ______ my investment portfolio for five years.
items.explanation: He gestionado (managed) mi cartera por cinco años.

items.prompt: We have [blank] [blank] any government bonds since May.
items.explanation: No hemos comprado bonos del gobierno desde mayo.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: Has your yield increased since last quarter?
items.explanation: ¿Ha subido tu rendimiento desde el trimestre pasado?

items.prompt: They have ______ in index funds since the market opened.
items.explanation: Se han mantenido (stayed) en fondos indexados.

items.prompt: I [blank] [blank] [blank] a financial advisor for a long time.
items.explanation: No he tenido un asesor financiero por mucho tiempo.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: How long has he tracked the market volatility?
items.explanation: ¿Cuánto tiempo lleva él siguiendo la volatilidad del mercado?

items.prompt: We have ______ our asset allocation twice this year.
items.explanation: Hemos cambiado (changed) nuestra asignación de activos.

items.prompt: She has [blank] her tech shares [blank] last Tuesday.
items.explanation: Ella ha mantenido sus acciones desde el martes pasado.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: I have not seen such high volatility for ages
items.explanation: No he visto una volatilidad tan alta en años.

items.prompt: Has the company ______ any dividends recently?
items.explanation: ¿Ha declarado (declared) la empresa dividendos?

items.prompt: We [blank] [blank] [blank] any crypto assets for six months.
items.explanation: No hemos poseído activos cripto por seis meses.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: How long have they held their gold assets?
items.explanation: ¿Cuánto tiempo han mantenido sus activos en oro?

items.prompt: I have ______ a professional trader since 2015.
items.explanation: He sido (been) un trader profesional.

items.prompt: They [blank] [blank] [blank] their portfolio since the merger.
items.explanation: No han equilibrado su cartera desde la fusión.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: She has tracked the ETF performance for a week
items.explanation: Ella ha seguido el rendimiento del ETF por una semana.

items.prompt: Have you ______ the new investment terms since yesterday?
items.explanation: ¿Has leído (read) las nuevas condiciones?

items.prompt: I [blank] [blank] my yield [blank] every month this year.
items.explanation: He revisado mi rendimiento todos los meses.

items.prompt: Reorder the sentence:
items.sentence: They have been bullish on tech for months
items.explanation: Han estado optimistas con la tecnología por meses.

items.prompt: Has she ______ her brokerage account since the update?
items.explanation: ¿Ha usado ella su cuenta desde la actualización?

items.prompt: We [blank] [blank] [blank] high yield since the crash.
items.explanation: No hemos visto un alto rendimiento desde el crash.
